reviews.title: User testimonials
reviews.noReviews: You don't have any reviews yet

brazil.review: I helped, I traveled, I earned. Thank you GoHappyGo!
brazil.name: James P.

south_africa.review: I treated myself to a restaurant with GoHappyGo earnings. Yes, I gave happiness, and I received a lot in return
south_africa.name: Theresa L.

australia.review: A simple but brilliant idea. The interface is intuitive and the concept addresses a real need.
australia.name: Marie D.

usa_east.review: A very beautiful human experience. Pierre, my HappyTraveler, was ultimately like a guide during my stay. I was a bit hesitant at first, but the platform is clear and reassuring. I was informed at every step.
usa_east.name: Christian L.

usa_west.review: A smooth platform, clear exchanges and a true sense of mutual aid between travelers.
usa_west.name: Johnson S.

france.review: I'm a mother of 4 children; I was able to bring plenty of things for the 'little' family on our trip without breaking the bank
france.name: Sophie M.

intro: We believe that traveling can be more than just a trip.
We believe that every journey is an opportunity.
An opportunity to create a bond.

section2.title: BEING A HAPPYTRAVELER,
lines: Is seeing in a free space a chance to be of service.
In a meeting, a trust to build.
In a luggage, a story to carry.
Useful for a planet to preserve.
Useful to give meaning back to our travels.

section3.title: BEING A HAPPYTRAVELER,
lines: Is believing in the power of small gestures.
And often, much more than that.
We move forward together, in a safe, transparent and respectful framework.
Because trust is not an option.

section4.title: BEING A HAPPYTRAVELER,
lines: That of those who choose solidarity over indifference, connection over isolation, meaning over routine.

ecologicalImpact.title:
YOUR TRIP, YOUR LUGGAGE...
HAS A STRONG ECOLOGICAL
IMPACT

sections.title: An alternative to heavy logistics solutions
sections.footerText: Luggage travels with people already on the move. This is the very essence of the sharing economy applied to travel.

sections.title: Sharing economy serving the environment
sections.intro: By using Gohappygo, each user becomes an actor of the ecological transition:
items: The carrier optimizes an empty space
The sender avoids a polluting solution
The community reduces its global footprint
sections.footerText: A small individual gesture, multiplied by thousands of travelers, can have a significant collective impact.

sections.title: Gohappygo, carry more than luggage
sections.intro: By choosing Gohappygo, you don't just transport a luggage. You carry:
sections.footerText: Because traveling better is not traveling less ‚Äî it is traveling more intelligently. üíôüåç

questions.question: Who Can Use Gohappygo?
questions.answer: Any adult with a verified account can use Gohappygo to offer or book luggage space.

questions.question: Are Profiles Verified?
questions.answer: Yes. All users go through identity verification during registration to guarantee a trusted community.

questions.question: What Is A HappyTraveler?
questions.answer: A HappyTraveler is a user who chooses to travel by helping others, or use the Gohappygo service, in a spirit of trust, sharing and kindness.

questions.question: Who Chooses The Luggage Carrier?
questions.answer: Whether booking or offering luggage space, one can freely choose their HappyTraveler, after consulting their profile, and exchanging with them. Cancellation is possible at any time before the trip. Any transaction must start and end on Gohappygo to benefit from our legal protection.

questions.question: How Is The Meeting Traceability Ensured?
questions.answer: During the meeting at the airport, and before check-in, the 2 travelers take a selfie via the application, which confirms their identity and confirms the meeting; this data is not held by any of the travelers.

questions.question: What Type Of Luggage Can Be Transported?
questions.answer: Only luggage authorized by regulations (suitcases, personal bags, non-dangerous effects) can be entrusted via Gohappygo.

questions.question: What Happens In Case Of Problem During The Trip?
questions.answer: Gohappygo is a secure framework, and of traceability. The platform provides 24/7 technical and legal assistance, regardless of location on the globe.

questions.question: How Does Payment Work?
questions.answer: Payment is 100% secure and held in escrow by the platform throughout the trip and automatically transferred upon validation by the 2 HappyTravelers.

questions.question: Can I Both Book And Offer Luggage Space?
questions.answer: Yes. Gohappygo allows you to take on both roles, depending on your needs and trips.

questions.question: How To Contact Gohappygo?
questions.answer: A support service is accessible directly via the application to accompany users at every step.

helpCenter.ariaSearch: Search for a question in the help center

faqs.a: Travelers offer available space in their luggage. You can ask them to transport your packages (per kilo).
Any dangerous, illegal item or item prohibited by airlines and customs is strictly forbidden.
The price is generally set per kilo. Payment is secured via the platform.
From an announcement, use the ‚ÄòRequest transport‚Äô or ‚ÄòContact‚Äô buttons to send your message.

faqs.q: How to define the weight to ship?
faqs.a: Indicate the estimated weight in kilograms. The HappyTraveler will confirm the remaining availability.

whatIsHappiness.title:
HAPPINESS,
IT'S ALSO SHARED!

section1.title: Traveling usefully is traveling happily
section1.content: Happiness is not just arriving at the destination. It's knowing that, during your journey, you helped someone.
items: A package that arrives on time
A lighter trip for someone else
A smile at the end of the road
section1.footer: At GoHappyGo, every trip can become a good and beautiful action.

section2.title: The happiness of being part of something bigger
section2.content: By using GoHappyGo, you are not just a user. You are part of a supportive community of travelers who:
section2.footer: Happiness is often born when one feels useful, connected and engaged.

section3.title: Small gestures. Big effects.
section3.content: Carrying a package is not much. But for someone else, it is sometimes:
section3.footer: Happiness is these ordinary little gestures that create extraordinary effects.

whatIsHappiness.footer:
BE A HAPPINESS CARRIER.
FOR OTHERS. FOR YOU. FOR TRAVELING DIFFERENTLY.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.description: By using GoHappyGo, you accept our general conditions. Please read this information carefully to understand your rights and responsibilities.
terms.section1: 1. GoHappyGo connects people with available space in their luggage and people wishing to ship items. Users are responsible for the transported content.
terms.section2: 2. HappyTravelers undertake to respect current laws and refuse any dangerous or prohibited object. Senders must precisely describe the content and weight.
terms.section3: 3. Payments and refunds follow the terms indicated at the time of the request.
terms.privacyDescription: We respect your privacy. This policy explains what data we collect, how we use it and your rights.
terms.privacySection1: 1. We collect account information (name, email), profile data and technical information to improve the service.
terms.privacySection2: 2. Your data is only shared with your consent or when the law requires it.
terms.privacySection3: 3. You can request access, rectification or deletion of your data.

security.title: Security Rules
security.subtitle: Our best practices for safe exchanges between travelers and senders.

allowedItems.title: 1. Allowed and Prohibited Items
allowedItems.desc: Respect airline regulations. Flammable materials, weapons, illegal products, and any dangerous objects are prohibited. If in doubt, contact our support.

identityVerification.title: 2. Identity Verification
identityVerification.desc: Complete your profile with accurate information. We recommend specific identity verification before any exchange.

packaging.title: 3. Package Handover and Sealing
packaging.desc: Take photos of the content, seal the package in the presence of both parties, and add a clear label (name, number, destination).

payment.title: 4. Secure Payment
payment.desc: Make payments only via the platform. Never send money outside the system.

communication.title: 5. Communication on the Platform
communication.desc: Prioritize integrated messaging to keep a record of exchanges and report any suspicious behavior.

meta.title: Security Rules - GoHappyGo
meta.description: Safety instructions and best practices for exchanges on GoHappyGo.
